Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash - Original

Brand: Beauty by Earth

Category: Facial Cleanser
book: 2657-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash - Original

chunk: Ingredients: *Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Decyl Glucoside, Coco-Glucoside, *Glycerin (Vegetable), *Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Extract, *Camellia Oleifera (Japanese Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Lauryl Glucoside, *Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Potassium Sorbate , Santalum Album
book: 2657-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash - Original

chunk: Extract, *Camellia Oleifera (Japanese Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Lauryl Glucoside, *Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Potassium Sorbate , Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Essential Oil, Vanilla Tahitensis (Vanilla) Fruit Extract
book: 2657-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash - Original
2657-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash - Original

chunk: Directions: : Pump about half a pump onto your finger tips or facial sponge and apply to your damp or wet face in a circular motion. Work up a nice lather and then rinse with warm water. Follow with toner, serums and facial moisturizer.
book: 2657-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash - Original

chunk:
Mode D’emploi: Pompez environ une demi-pompe dans le bout de vos doigts ou une éponge faciale et appliquez sur votre visage humide ou mouillé en un mouvement circulaire. Faites mousser puis rincez à l'eau tiède. Suivez avec du toner, des sérums et un hydratant pour
le visage.

Warnings: : For external use only. Stop using if irritation occurs.
book: 2657-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash - Original

chunk:
Warnings: : For external use only. Stop using if irritation occurs.

Avertissement: Seulement pour usage externe. Arrêtez d'utiliser en cas d'irritation.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 2657-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash - Original
